name: It has tne butler
description: You are the butler and you are the murderer. the police inspector was invited to dinner at 10 pm. you have an hour to hide the body and the murder weapon, leave the room without suspicion. use the mouse for this - one click, two clicks and drag as you go. remember the inspector is a friend of the boss, very observant, he is always armed and loves to kill butlers. Good luck.
